title: Introduction to JSON
subtitle: Basics of JSON Structure
body: JSON stands for JavaScript Object Notation and is used for data interchange.

title: Why Use JSON?
subtitle: Benefits of JSON
body: JSON is lightweight, easy to read, and widely supported across programming languages.

title: JSON Syntax
subtitle: Understanding the Format
body: JSON uses key-value pairs and supports arrays and nested objects.

title: Working with JSON in Python
subtitle: Python and JSON
body: Python provides the json module to parse and generate JSON data.

title: Common JSON Use Cases
subtitle: Applications of JSON
body: JSON is commonly used in APIs, configuration files, and data storage.
